title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 120.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 120.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part contains the procedures to be followed by the Department of Law in
compliance with chapter 933 of the Laws of 1977 entitled "Freedom of Information Law". Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
120.1

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
